title: Analysis of composite sine function part - b

content.description: Let f be the function defined by f(x)=sin2x−sinx for 0 ≤ x ≤ 3π/2
content.question: Find the intervals on which f is increasing.

frqParts.text: Find the intervals on which f is increasing.

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
